name: Flickflock*
description:
PS: web version is flocking buggy! Windows download below!

In the dodgeball-meets-snake game Flickflock, flick and flock flickchicks as flickchickens to flick your flock to flicktory to become the Flickking!

yeah sorry

Powerups!

Physics!

Local multiplayer for up to 4 players!

Keyboard and controller support!

but I very very VERY strongly recommend controllers, keyboard is kiiiiinda buggy
